argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zprod.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | zprod.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | zprod.3 | |- ( ph -> E. n e. Z E. y ( y =/= 0 /\ seq n ( x. , F ) ~~> y ) ) |
| 4 |  | iprod.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = B ) |
| 5 |  | iprod.5 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 6 |  | #P_ssid | |- Z C_ Z |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> Z C_ Z ) |
| 8 |  | #P_iftrue | |- ( k e. Z -> if ( k e. Z , B , 1 ) = B ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> if ( k e. Z , B , 1 ) = B ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = if ( k e. Z , B , 1 ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 7, 10, 5 | #P_zprod | |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. Z B = ( ~~> ` seq M ( x. , F ) ) ) |
